Module it.polimi.ingsw.am11
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am11.view.client.TUI.states

Class TUIState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am11.view.client.TUI.states.TUIState
Direct Known Subclasses:
Chat, ChoosingObj, ChoosingStrt, Connecting, Ended, SettingName, SettingNum, Waiting, WatchingField, WatchingTable
public abstract class TUIState extends Object
This abstract class represents the states of the TUI. The states are used to display specific information to the user, each state will accept only specific commands and will display only specific information.

  • Method Details

    • passArgs

      public abstract void passArgs (Actuator actuator, String[] args)
      This method is used to pass the read line to the TUI state
      Parameters:
      actuator - the actuator that will call the methods of the CltToNetConnector
      args - the arguments passed by the user

    • restart

      public abstract void restart (boolean dueToEx, @Nullable @Nullable Exception exception)
      This method is used to restart the TUI state
      Parameters:
      dueToEx - if the restart is due to an exception
      exception - the exception that caused the restart if present

    • getState

      public abstract TuiStates getState()
      This method is used to identify the specific state of an instance of a class extending TUIState.
      Returns:
      the specific TuiStates enum value representing the state of the instance.
